rows.label: tev057001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev057001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Nio about the weather in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev057001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Nio about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0001
rows.name: Weather in Cauldros can get REALLY nasty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0002
rows.name:
In daytime, you get rainâ€”and not water rain either!
It rain FIRE! And just when Nio think life is going to
end in burning armageddon...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then night fall and sparkling energy mist comes!
Mist make dark creatures waaay stronger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0004
rows.name:
Nio have to take Popo and wait night out in caves
more times than Nio care to count.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0005
rows.name:
If traveler friend is planning on going there,
friend better scope out good place to hide in case
weather turns all scary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0008
rows.name:
Normally Nio makes living selling things out of
Drongo Caravan in Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0009
rows.name:
But just look at this place! Has friend ever seen
anywhere so white and shiny and breathtaking?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Popo, girl of Nio, really like it here, so we visit often
as lovebird couple.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0011
rows.name: Nio have vacation time built up, so here we are![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0012
rows.name:
Say, did friend see wedding dress for sale at that
shop over there? So pretty![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0013
rows.name:
*sigh* Nio cannot wait for day when Popo wears
lovely dress and Nio gets to marry her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Nio about the weather in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Nio about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0018
rows.name: Friend must already know this, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0019
rows.name:
When spores come out, it can be really hard to see
what is going on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0020
rows.name:
And at night, red aurora come out. Popo like red
aurora because of sexy romance factor,
but friend should watch out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0021
rows.name:
Aurora flashing irritates eyes and makes it hard to
aim at enemies from distance. Total pain in tuft![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0014
rows.name:
Nio still cannot believe that friend had ring after all
this time![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0015
rows.name:
Nio feels a bit silly for kvetching so much,
but all is well that endings well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0016
rows.name:
From now on, Nio going to work extra hard at
Drongo Caravan to give Popo happy life![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev057001_MSG0017
rows.name:
But not TOO hard! Nio know better than to overextend
self. Nio going to set time aside and shower Popo with
love Popo deserve![ST:wait ]
